array.title: What minimum amount of CHO can I stake?
array.description: You can stake any amount of CHO

array.title: I have already staked CHO. Can I stake more?
array.description: Yes, you can create an unlimited number of locks. Tap on the “Manage” → “Increase amount” and add any amount of CHO to the already existing lock.

array.title: How can I change the period of my lock?
array.description: Tap on “Manage” → “Expires Date” to prolong the period of your lock. Reduction of the period is not allowed.

array.title: How can I close my lock ahead of time?
array.description: You cannot close your lock ahead of time, but you can sell your veCHO to another user through OpenSea. The user will receive your lock to his wallet.

array.title: What is veCHO?
array.description: veCHO is the NFT of your lock. It contains all information about the staked tokens and provides you with the right to receive rewards.

array.title: What is the maximum period of lock?
How often are rewards distributed?
array.description: The reward for staking is distributed at the beginning of each month. Go to the Staking section and tap on “Claim” – the reward will be added to the amount of your lock.
